actionPack.name: Jetty
actionPack.description: Integration actions for the Jetty embeddable web server.  More information on Jetty available at jetty.apache.org.
actionPack.author: CA Technologies

SCRIPTAction.name: Jetty - Install - Linux
SCRIPTAction.description: Install Jetty on a target Linux system by providing the location of the Jetty download as a tar file and the destination installation folder.

inputParamList.name: Tar File URL
inputParamList.description: The location of the Jetty tar file for download an installation on a Linux system.

inputParamList.name: Installation Directory
inputParamList.description: The directory to install Jetty on to.

inputParamList.name: Distribution Name
inputParamList.description: Distribution name that contains in tar file.

outputParamList.name: Execution Output
outputParamList.description: Standard out from the command execution.

scripts.name: JettyInstallLinux1415176916401.sh
